addition.item: New trigger options: fire confetti on button click, URL hash (#confetti), or both
Customizable trigger button with text, style, and size options
Custom CSS field in Advanced tab - use .el-element to style your confetti element
Custom HTML attributes support in Advanced tab

fix.item: Fixed element tracking in YOOtheme builder - element now highlights correctly when selected
Improved animation cleanup when switching between styles in the builder
Settings and Advanced tabs now work correctly like other YOOtheme elements

Added full support for PHP 8.1 through 8.4+
